jext.letter

Letter

class Letter;
The letters that make up the text

May have the text bounce up and down

@property ref auto xpos();
x position

@property ref auto ypos();
y position

@property ref auto letter();
letter

@property ref auto lock();
lock state

@property ref auto alternate();
alterating colour on/off switch

@property ref auto altColour();
second colour for the alterating colour being on

void setPostion(double x, double y);
postion the letter

this(dchar letter);
ctor new letter

void update();
For the letter behaviour(sp)

May:
1. Bounce the letter up and down

2. Keep changing the colour of the letter

void draw();
Draw the letter

Draws:
1. Alternating

2. Changing colour
